com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.cluster

Class ClusterServerNodeImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.cluster.ClusterServerNodeImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClusterServerNode, ServerNode

    public class ClusterServerNodeImpl
extends Object
implements ClusterServerNode
    Value class used by NetworkClient to keep track of state of a single cluster node. Instances are mutable to a degree, and properly synchronized to allow thread-safe use.

      • isDisabled

        public boolean isDisabled()
        Description copied from interface: ClusterServerNode
        Whether server node is disabled: usually occurs during shutdowns and startups, and is considered a transient state. Clients typically try to avoid GET access from disabled nodes; and schedule updates (if any) after all enabled instances.
        Specified by:
        isDisabled in interface ClusterServerNode

      • calculateSortingDistance

        public int calculateSortingDistance(KeyHash keyHash)
        Method for calculating distance metrics to use for sorting server nodes based on distance. In addition to basic clock-wise distance from start point we also consider disabled nodes to be further away than any enabled nodes; this is done by adding full length of key space to basic clock-wise distance. *
